name: I Wanna Be a Cookie!
description:
You're an up-and-coming piece of cookie dough, ready to be the best cookie in the world!

All you have left to do is make it to the oven. Navigate the kitchen and collect ingredients to make yourself the most scrumptious cookie out there!

Controls:
Also viewable in "How to Play" in game.
Movement - WASD
Space - Stretch/retract dough
R - Restart level
Esc - Quit game

Common Bugs and Solutions:

-Problem: Stretched dough won't move / disappears / is stuck
-Solution: Press "Space" to undo your current dough, if you stretch again the issue will be resolved

-Problem: Trail dough is missing or there are spaces between trail
-Solution: See above. Pressing WASD rather than holding is another solution.

-Problem: I can't pull boxes as sticky dough
- Solution: See above

-Problem: Boxes aren't aligned / I can't move boxes
-Solution: Press "R" to restart the level, the boxes will be realigned
